name: Super Preggle Vaporwave Tic-Tac-Toe
description:
Dublin Institute of Technology Games Design Year 1 

Games Production  Assignment 1 

As a group we were given a Tic-Tac-Toe to recreate. We decided to do anything but that. So in creating of the game we allow you to play Tic-Tac-Toe while you wait for lots of random images that play sounds or lead you to other small minigames while you play.

Created by Jamie Darling and Cian Dervan.
